name: Battle Aghast Robot: Sea War
description:
Battle Aghast Robot: Sea War will be the frontline defense against the attack enemy & warriors in futuristic battle of robot war with a new dimension to robot transformation in this best action games and destroy ships. Once you have killed the robots on land, you need to transform into a animal sea and fight enemy underwater to make sure that there is no trace of them.
Features:
- Multiple levels to play
- High definition graphics and animations
- Smooth ship and robot controls
- Underwater torpedo shooting
- Detailed destruction animations
